assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: SK, VK and EE are employed by the company KWS LOCHOW GMBH. OA and MH are employed by Syngenta Seeds and MWG and JP are employed by the company TraitGenetics GmbH. The companies have commercial interest in the results for application in variety development and for the provision of genotyping services. This does not alter the authors’ adherence to all HEREDITY policies on sharing data and materials.

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
